description: MCP server for calculating the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two numbers

tools.name: find_gcd
tools.description: Calculate the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two integers using Euclidean algorithm
tools.implementation:
# Handle negative numbers by taking absolute values
    a = abs(a)
    b = abs(b)
    
    # Euclidean algorithm
    while b != 0:
        temp = b
        b = a % b
        a = temp
    
    return a

tools.name: find_gcd_multiple
tools.description: Calculate the GCD of multiple integers

parameters.name: numbers
parameters.description: List of integers to find the GCD of
